BioLib  3.6.2
A GUI-less version of Bio .NET library for editing & annotating various microscopy image formats.

4using AForge.Imaging.Filters;

34namespace BioLib

36 /* A class declaration. */
37 public static class Images
38 {
39 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
40
43 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
44 {
45 ids = ids.Replace("\\", "/");
46 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
47 {
48 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].Filename == Path.GetFileName(ids))
49 return images[i];
50 }
51 return null;
52 }
56 public static void AddImage(BioImage im)
57 {
58 if (images.Contains(im))
59 return;
60 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.Filename);
61 images.Add(im);
62 }
69 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
70 {
71 int i = 0;
72 s = RemoveExtensions(s);
73 if (s.Contains("-"))
74 {
75 string ss = RemoveExtensions(s.Substring(s.LastIndexOf("-"), s.Length - s.LastIndexOf("-")));
76 s = ss;
77 }
78 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
79 {
80 if (images[im].ID.Contains(s))
81 i++;
82 }
83 return i;
84 }
90 public static string RemoveExtensions(string file)
91 {
92 return Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file));
93 }
99 public static string GetExtensions(string file)
100 {
101 string[] ex = file.Split(".");
102 if (ex.Length == 1)
103 return "." + ex[0];
104 else
105 if (ex.Length > 2)
106 return "." + ex[ex.Length - 2] + "." + ex[ex.Length - 1];
107 else
108 return "." + ex.Last();
109 }
110
116 public static string GetImageName(string s)
117 {
118 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
119 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
120 if (i == 0)
121 return Path.GetFileName(s);
122 string name = RemoveExtensions(s);
123 string ext = GetExtensions(s);
124 if (name.EndsWith("-" + i))
125 name = name.Substring(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
126 return name + "-" + (i + 1) + ext;
127 }
131 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
132 {
133 RemoveImage(im.Filename);
134 }
140 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
141 {
142 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
143 if (im == null)
144 return;
145 images.Remove(im);
146 im.Dispose();
147 }
153 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
154 {
155 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
156 {
157 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
158 {
159 images[i] = im;
160 return;
161 }
162 }
163 }
164 }
165 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
166 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
167 public struct Resolution
168 {
169 int x;
170 int y;
171 PixelFormat format;
172 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
173 public int SizeX
174 {
175 get { return x; }
176 set { x = value; }
177 }
178 public int SizeY
179 {
180 get { return y; }
181 set { y = value; }
182 }
183 public double PhysicalSizeX
184 {
185 get { return px; }
186 set { px = value; }
187 }
188 public double PhysicalSizeY
189 {
190 get { return py; }
191 set { py = value; }
192 }
193 public double PhysicalSizeZ
194 {
195 get { return pz; }
196 set { pz = value; }
197 }
198 public double StageSizeX
199 {
200 get { return sx; }
201 set { sx = value; }
202 }
203 public double StageSizeY
204 {
205 get { return sy; }
206 set { sy = value; }
207 }
208 public double StageSizeZ
209 {
210 get { return sz; }
211 set { sz = value; }
212 }
213 public double VolumeWidth
214 {
215 get
216 {
217 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
218 }
219 }
220 public double VolumeHeight
221 {
222 get
223 {
224 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
225 }
226 }
227 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
228 {
229 get { return format; }
230 set { format = value; }
231 }
232 public int RGBChannelsCount
233 {
234 get
235 {
236 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
237 return 1;
238 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
239 return 3;
240 else
241 return 4;
242 }
243 }
244 public long SizeInBytes
245 {
246 get
247 {
248 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
249 return (long)y * (long)x;
250 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
251 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
252 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
253 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
254 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
255 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
256 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
257 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
258 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
259 }
260 }
261 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
262 {
263 x = w;
264 y = h;
265 sx = stageX;
266 sy = stageY;
267 sz = stageZ;
268 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
269 px = physX;
270 py = physY;
271 pz = physZ;
272 }
273 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
274 {
275 x = w;
276 y = h;
277 format = f;
278 sx = stageX;
279 sy = stageY;
280 sz = stageZ;
281 px = physX;
282 py = physY;
283 pz = physZ;
284 }
285 public Resolution Copy()
286 {
287 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
288 }
289 public override string ToString()
290 {
291 return "new Resolution(" + SizeX + "," + SizeY + "," + format + "," + PhysicalSizeX + "," + PhysicalSizeY + "," + PhysicalSizeZ + "," + StageSizeX + "," + StageSizeY + "," + StageSizeZ + ");";
292 }
293 }
294
295 /* The ROI class is a class that contains a list of points, a bounding box, and a type */
296 public class ROI : IDisposable
297 {
298 /* Defining an enum. */
299 public enum Type
300 {
301 Rectangle,
302 Point,
303 Line,
304 Polygon,
305 Polyline,
306 Freeform,
307 Ellipse,
308 Label,
309 Mask
310 }
311 /* A property of a class. */
312 public PointD Point
313 {
314 get
315 {
316 if (type == Type.Mask)
317 return new PointD(roiMask.X * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX, roiMask.Y * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY);
318 return Points[0];
319 }
320 set
321 {
322 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
323 UpdateBoundingBox();
324 }
325 }
326 public RectangleD Rect
327 {
328 get
329 {
330 if (Points.Count == 0)
331 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
332 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
333 return BoundingBox;
334 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
335 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
336 if (type == Type.Mask)
337 {
338 return new RectangleD(roiMask.X * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX, roiMask.Y * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY, roiMask.Width * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX, roiMask.Height * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY);
339 }
340 else
341 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, W, H);
342 }
343 set
344 {
345 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
346 {
347 BoundingBox = value;
348 }
349 else
350 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
351 {
352 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
353 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
354 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
355 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
356 }
357 else
358 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
359 {
360 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
361 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
362 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
363 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
364 }
365 UpdateBoundingBox();
366 }
367 }
368 public double X
369 {
370 get
371 {
372 if (type == Type.Mask)
373 {
374 return roiMask.X * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX;
375 }
376 return Point.X;
377 }
378 set
379 {
380 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
381 }
382 }
383 public double Y
384 {
385 get
386 {
387 if (type == Type.Mask)
388 {
389 return roiMask.Y * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY;
390 }
391 return Point.Y;
392 }
393 set
394 {
395 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
396 }
397 }
398 public double W
399 {
400 get
401 {
402 if (type == Type.Mask)
403 {
404 return roiMask.Width * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX;
405 }
406 if (type == Type.Point)
407 return strokeWidth;
408 else
409 return BoundingBox.W;
410 }
411 set
412 {
413 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
414 }
415 }
416 public double H
417 {
418 get
419 {
420 if (type == Type.Mask)
421 {
422 return roiMask.Height * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY;
423 }
424 if (type == Type.Point)
425 return strokeWidth;
426 else
427 return BoundingBox.H;
428 }
429 set
430 {
431 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
432 }
433 }
434 public int Resolution
435 {
436 get { return resolution; }
437 set { resolution = value; }
438 }
439 public enum CoordinateSystem
440 {
441 pixel,
442 micron
443 }
444 public Type type;
445 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
446 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
447 public List<PointD> PointsD
448 {
449 get
450 {
451 return Points;
452 }
453 }
454 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
455 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
456 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
457 public float fontSize = 12;
458 public Cairo.FontSlant slant;
459 public Cairo.FontWeight weight;
460 public string family = "Times New Roman";
461 public ZCT coord;
462 public Color strokeColor;
463 public Color fillColor;
464 public bool isFilled = false;
465 public string id = "";
466 public string roiID = "";
467 public string roiName = "";
468 public string properties = "";
469 public int serie = 0;
470 private string text = "";
471 private int resolution = 0;
472 public double strokeWidth = 1;
473 public int shapeIndex = 0;
474 public bool closed = false;
475 bool selected = false;
476 public bool Selected
477 {
478 get { return selected; }
479 set
480 {
481 if (roiMask != null)
482 roiMask.Selected = value;
483 selected = value;
484 if (!selected)
485 selectedPoints.Clear();
486 }
487 }
488 public bool subPixel = false;
489 public Mask roiMask { get; set; }
493 public class Mask : IDisposable
494 {
495 public float min = 0;
496 float[] mask;
497 int width;
498 int height;
499 public double X { get; set; }
500 public double Y { get; set; }
501 public int Width { get { return width; } set { width = value; } }
502 public int Height { get { return height; } set { height = value; } }
503 public double PhysicalSizeX { get; set; }
504 public double PhysicalSizeY { get; set; }
505 bool updatePixbuf = true;
506 bool updateColored = true;
507 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
508 Gdk.Pixbuf colored;
509 bool selected = false;
510 internal bool Selected
511 {
512 get { return selected; }
513 set
514 {
515 selected = value;
516 }
517 }
518 public bool IsSelected(int x, int y)
519 {
520 int ind = y * width + x;
521 if (ind >= mask.Length)
522 return false;
523 if (mask[ind] > min)
524 {
525 return true;
526 }
527 return false;
528 }
529 public float GetValue(int x, int y)
530 {
531 int ind = y * width + x;
532 if (ind > mask.Length)
533 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
534 return mask[ind];
535 }
536 public void SetValue(int x, int y, float val)
537 {
538 int ind = y * width + x;
539 if (ind > mask.Length)
540 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
541 mask[ind] = val;
542 updatePixbuf = true;
543 updateColored = true;
544 }
545 public Mask(float[] fts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY, double x, double y)
546 {
547 this.width = width;
548 this.height = height;
549 X = x; Y = y;
550 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
551 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
552 mask = fts;
553 byte[] bt = GetBytesCropped();
554 mask = new float[bt.Length];
555 for (int i = 0; i < bt.Length; i++)
556 {
557 mask[i] = (float)bt[i];
558 }
559 }
560 public Mask(byte[] fts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY, double x, double y)
561 {
562 this.width = width;
563 this.height = height;
564 this.X = x / physX;
565 this.Y = y / physY;
566 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
567 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
568 mask = new float[fts.Length];
569 for (int i = 0; i < fts.Length; i++)
570 {
571 mask[i] = (float)fts[i];
572 }
573 }
574 public Gdk.Pixbuf Pixbuf
575 {
576 get
577 {
578 if (updatePixbuf)
579 {
580 if (pixbuf != null)
581 pixbuf.Dispose();
582 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
583 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
584 {
585 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
586 {
587 int ind = y * width + x;
588 if (mask[ind] > 0)
589 {
590 pixelData[4 * ind] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Blue
591 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Green
592 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Red
593 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;// Alpha
594 }
595 else
596 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
597 }
598 }
599 pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(pixelData, true, 8, width, height, width * 4);
600 updatePixbuf = false;
601 return pixbuf;
602 }
603 else
604 return pixbuf;
605 }
606 }
607 void UpdateColored(AForge.Color col, byte alpha)
608 {
609 if (mask == null || mask.Length < width * height)
610 throw new InvalidOperationException("Invalid mask size.");
611 // Get the minimum and maximum values of the mask for normalization
612 var (min, max) = GetMinAndMax(mask);
613 min = 0;
614 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
615
616 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
617 {
618 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
619 {
620 int ind = y * width + x;
621
622 if (ind < mask.Length)
623 {
624 float value = mask[ind];
625 if (value > 0)
626 {
627 pixelData[4 * ind] = col.R; // Red
628 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = col.G; // Green
629 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = col.B; // Blue
630 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = alpha; // Alpha
631 }
632 }
633 }
634 }
635
636 // Create Gdk.Pixbuf with the updated pixel data
637 colored = new Gdk.Pixbuf(pixelData, true, 8, width, height, width * 4);
638
639 // Mark as updated
640 updateColored = false;
641 }
642
643 public Gdk.Pixbuf GetColored(AForge.Color col, byte alpha, bool forceUpdate = false)
644 {
645 if (updateColored || forceUpdate)
646 {
647 UpdateColored(col, alpha);
648 return colored;
649 }
650 else
651 return colored;
652 }
653
654 public byte[] GetColoredBytes(AForge.Color col)
655 {
656 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height];
657 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
658 {
659 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
660 {
661 int ind = y * width + x;
662
663 if (ind < mask.Length)
664 {
665 float value = mask[ind];
666 if (value > 0)
667 {
668 pixelData[ind] = (byte)value;
669 }
670 }
671 }
672 }
673 return pixelData;
674 }
675
689 public static (byte[] grayImage, int cropWidth, int cropHeight, int startX, int startY) OutputAs8BitImage(
690 float[] fullMask, int imageWidth, int imageHeight, float threshold = 0.0f)
691 {
692 if (fullMask == null || fullMask.Length != imageWidth * imageHeight)
693 throw new ArgumentException("Invalid mask dimensions or null mask.");
694
695 // Crop the mask using the threshold
696 var cropResult = CropFullImageMask(fullMask, imageWidth, imageHeight, threshold);
697 float[] croppedMask = cropResult.croppedMask;
698
699 // Handle empty crop
700 if (croppedMask == null || croppedMask.Length == 0)
701 return (Array.Empty<byte>(), 0, 0, 0, 0);
702
703 int cropWidth = cropResult.cropWidth;
704 int cropHeight = cropResult.cropHeight;
705
706 // Normalize and convert to 8-bit grayscale
707 byte[] grayImage = new byte[cropWidth * cropHeight];
708 for (int i = 0; i < croppedMask.Length; i++)
709 {
710 grayImage[i] = (byte)(Math.Clamp(croppedMask[i], 0.0f, 1.0f) * 255);
711 }
712
713 return (grayImage, cropWidth, cropHeight, cropResult.startX, cropResult.startY);
714 }
720 public static (float min, float max) GetMinAndMax(float[] floatArray)
721 {
722 if (floatArray == null || floatArray.Length == 0)
723 throw new ArgumentException("Input array must not be null or empty.");
724
725 float min = floatArray[0];
726 float max = floatArray[0];
727
728 foreach (float value in floatArray)
729 {
730 if (value < min)
731 {
732 min = value;
733 }
734 if (value > max)
735 {
736 max = value;
737 }
738 }
739
740 return (min, max);
741 }
742 private byte[] GetBytesCropped()
743 {
744 // Crop the mask using a threshold of 0
745 var cropResult = CropFullImageMask(mask, this.Width, this.Height, 0.0f);
746 float[] croppedMask = cropResult.croppedMask;
747
748 // Handle empty mask case
749 if (croppedMask == null || croppedMask.Length == 0)
750 return Array.Empty<byte>();
751
752 // Get the minimum and maximum values of the mask for normalization
753 var (min, max) = GetMinAndMax(croppedMask);
754 min = 0;
755 // Handle case where all values are equal (avoid division by zero)
756 if (Math.Abs(max - min) < float.Epsilon)
757 return Array.Empty<byte>();
758
759 // Prepare the byte array for the normalized output
760 int cropWidth = cropResult.cropWidth;
761 int cropHeight = cropResult.cropHeight;
762 byte[] bytes = new byte[cropWidth * cropHeight];
763
764 // Normalize float values and convert to byte
765 for (int y = 0; y < cropHeight; y++)
766 {
767 for (int x = 0; x < cropWidth; x++)
768 {
769 int index = y * cropWidth + x; // 1D index for the mask
770 if (croppedMask[index] > 0)
771 {
772 // Normalize the value: (value - min) / (max - min) * 255
773 float normalized = (croppedMask[index] - min) / (max - min);
774 bytes[index] = (byte)(normalized * 255);
775 }
776 }
777 }
778 X = cropResult.startX;
779 Y = cropResult.startY;
780 width = cropWidth;
781 height = cropHeight;
782 return bytes;
783 }
784 public byte[] GetBytes()
785 {
786 byte[] rgbaBytes = new byte[width * height];
787 for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++)
788 {
789 for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++)
790 {
791 int index = y * Width + x; // 1D index for the mask
792 // Set RGBA channels
793 rgbaBytes[index] = (byte)mask[index];
794 }
795 }
796 return rgbaBytes;
797 }
798
813 public static (float[] croppedMask, int cropWidth, int cropHeight, int startX, int startY) CropFullImageMask(
814 float[] fullMask, int imageWidth, int imageHeight, float threshold = 0.0f)
815 {
816 if (fullMask == null || fullMask.Length != imageWidth * imageHeight)
817 throw new ArgumentException("Invalid mask dimensions or null mask.");
818
819 // Initialize bounding box values
820 int minX = imageWidth, minY = imageHeight, maxX = -1, maxY = -1;
821
822 // Find the bounding box of "white" pixels
823 for (int y = 0; y < imageHeight; y++)
824 {
825 for (int x = 0; x < imageWidth; x++)
826 {
827 int index = y * imageWidth + x;
828 if (fullMask[index] > threshold) // Pixel exceeds threshold, considered "white"
829 {
830 minX = Math.Min(minX, x);
831 minY = Math.Min(minY, y);
832 maxX = Math.Max(maxX, x);
833 maxY = Math.Max(maxY, y);
834 }
835 }
836 }
837
838 // Handle cases where no white pixels are found
839 if (minX > maxX || minY > maxY)
840 return (Array.Empty<float>(), 0, 0, 0, 0); // Return an empty mask
841
842 // Calculate the cropped region dimensions
843 int cropWidth = maxX - minX + 1;
844 int cropHeight = maxY - minY + 1;
845
846 // Extract the cropped region
847 float[] croppedMask = new float[cropWidth * cropHeight];
848 for (int y = 0; y < cropHeight; y++)
849 {
850 for (int x = 0; x < cropWidth; x++)
851 {
852 int sourceIndex = (minY + y) * imageWidth + (minX + x);
853 int targetIndex = y * cropWidth + x;
854
855 croppedMask[targetIndex] = fullMask[sourceIndex];
856 }
857 }
858
859 return (croppedMask, cropWidth, cropHeight, minX, minY);
860 }
861
862 public void Dispose()
863 {
864 if (pixbuf != null)
865 pixbuf.Dispose();
866 if (colored != null)
867 colored.Dispose();
868 mask = null;
869 }
870 }
871 /*
872 public Size TextSize
873 {
874 get
875 {
876 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
877 }
878 }
879 */
880 public ROI Copy()
881 {
882 ROI copy = new ROI();
883 copy.id = id;
884 copy.roiID = roiID;
885 copy.roiName = roiName;
886 copy.text = text;
887 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
888 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
889 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
890 copy.Points = Points;
891 copy.Selected = Selected;
892 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
893 copy.closed = closed;
894 copy.family = family;
895 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
896 copy.slant = slant;
897 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
898 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
899 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
900 copy.coord = coord;
901 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
902
903 return copy;
904 }
905 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
906 {
907 ROI copy = new ROI();
908 copy.type = type;
909 copy.id = id;
910 copy.roiID = roiID;
911 copy.roiName = roiName;
912 copy.text = text;
913 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
914 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
915 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
916 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
917 copy.Selected = Selected;
918 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
919 copy.closed = closed;
920 copy.family = family;
921 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
922 copy.slant = slant;
923 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
924 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
925 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
926 copy.coord = cord;
927 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
928 return copy;
929 }
930 public string Text
931 {
932 get
933 {
934 return text;
935 }
936 set
937 {
938 text = value;
939 if (type == Type.Label)
940 {
941 UpdateBoundingBox();
942 }
943 }
944 }
951 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scaleX, double scaleY)
952 {
953 if (type == Type.Mask)
954 return BoundingBox;
955 double fx = scaleX / 2;
956 double fy = scaleY / 2;
957 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - fx, BoundingBox.Y - fy, BoundingBox.W + scaleX, BoundingBox.H + scaleY);
958 }
959 /* Creating a new ROI object. */
960 public ROI()
961 {
962 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
963 strokeColor = Color.Yellow;
964 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
965 }
977 public PointD[] ImagePoints(Resolution res)
978 {
979 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Mask)
980 {
981 PointD[] pts = new PointD[4];
982 pts[0] = PointsD[0];
983 pts[1] = new PointD(PointsD[0].X + BoundingBox.W, PointsD[0].Y);
984 pts[2] = new PointD(PointsD[0].X + BoundingBox.W, PointsD[0].Y + BoundingBox.H);
985 pts[3] = new PointD(PointsD[0].X, PointsD[0].Y + BoundingBox.H);
986 return BioImage.ToImageSpace(pts.ToList(), res.StageSizeX, res.StageSizeY, res.PhysicalSizeX, res.PhysicalSizeY);
987 }
988 else
989 return BioImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD, res.StageSizeX, res.StageSizeY, res.PhysicalSizeX, res.PhysicalSizeY);
990 }
997 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
998 {
999 double f = s / 2;
1000 selectBoxs.Clear();
1001 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1002 {
1003 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
1004 }
1005 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
1006 }
1013 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes()
1014 {
1015 double f = ROI.selectBoxSize / 2;
1016 selectBoxs.Clear();
1017 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1018 {
1019 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)ROI.selectBoxSize, (float)ROI.selectBoxSize));
1020 }
1021 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
1022 }
1030 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
1031 {
1032 ROI an = new ROI();
1033 an.coord = coord;
1034 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
1035 an.type = Type.Point;
1036 return an;
1037 }
1045
1046 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
1047 {
1048 ROI an = new ROI();
1049 an.coord = coord;
1050 an.type = Type.Line;
1051 an.AddPoint(x1);
1052 an.AddPoint(x2);
1053 return an;
1054 }
1064 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1065 {
1066 ROI an = new ROI();
1067 an.coord = coord;
1068 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
1069 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
1070 return an;
1071 }
1081 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1082 {
1083 ROI an = new ROI();
1084 an.coord = coord;
1085 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
1086 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
1087 return an;
1088 }
1095 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
1096 {
1097 ROI an = new ROI();
1098 an.coord = coord;
1099 an.type = Type.Polygon;
1100 an.AddPoints(pts);
1101 an.closed = true;
1102 return an;
1103 }
1110 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
1111 {
1112 ROI an = new ROI();
1113 an.coord = coord;
1114 an.type = Type.Freeform;
1115 an.AddPoints(pts);
1116 an.closed = true;
1117 return an;
1118 }
1119 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, float[] mask, int width, int height, PointD loc, double physicalX, double physicalY)
1120 {
1121 ROI an = new ROI();
1122 an.coord = coord;
1123 an.type = Type.Mask;
1124 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height, physicalX, physicalY, loc.X, loc.Y);
1125 an.AddPoint(loc);
1126 an.X = loc.X + (an.roiMask.X * an.roiMask.PhysicalSizeX);
1127 an.Y = loc.X + (an.roiMask.Y * an.roiMask.PhysicalSizeY);
1128 return an;
1129 }
1130 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, Byte[] mask, int width, int height, PointD loc, double physicalX, double physicalY)
1131 {
1132 ROI an = new ROI();
1133 an.coord = coord;
1134 an.type = Type.Mask;
1135 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height, physicalX, physicalY, loc.X, loc.Y);
1136 an.AddPoint(loc);
1137 an.X = loc.X + an.roiMask.X;
1138 an.Y = loc.X + an.roiMask.Y;
1139 return an;
1140 }
1141 // Calculate the center point of the ROI
1142 public PointD GetCenter()
1143 {
1144 return new PointD(Rect.X + (Rect.W / 2.0), Rect.Y + (Rect.H / 2.0));
1145 }
1146
1147 // Calculate the distance to another point
1148 public double DistanceTo(PointD point)
1149 {
1150 var center = GetCenter();
1151 return (float)Math.Sqrt(Math.Pow(center.X - point.X, 2) + Math.Pow(center.Y - point.Y, 2));
1152 }
1157 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
1158 {
1159 if (i < Points.Count)
1160 {
1161 Points[i] = p;
1162 }
1163 UpdateBoundingBox();
1164 }
1170 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
1171 {
1172 return Points[i];
1173 }
1177 public PointD[] GetPoints()
1178 {
1179 return Points.ToArray();
1180 }
1184 public PointF[] GetPointsF()
1185 {
1186 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
1187 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1188 {
1189 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
1190 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
1191 }
1192 return pfs;
1193 }
1197 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
1198 {
1199 Points.Add(p);
1200 UpdateBoundingBox();
1201 }
1205 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
1206 {
1207 Points.AddRange(p);
1208 UpdateBoundingBox();
1209 }
1213 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
1214 {
1215 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1216 {
1217 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1218 }
1219 UpdateBoundingBox();
1220 }
1224 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
1225 {
1226 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1227 {
1228 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1229 }
1230 UpdateBoundingBox();
1231 }
1235 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
1236 {
1237 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
1238 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1239 {
1240 bool found = false;
1241 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
1242 {
1243 if (indexs[ind] == i)
1244 found = true;
1245 }
1246 if (!found)
1247 inds.Add(Points[i]);
1248 }
1249 Points = inds;
1250 UpdateBoundingBox();
1251 }
1252 public void ClearPoints()
1253 {
1254 Points.Clear();
1255 }
1259 public int GetPointCount()
1260 {
1261 return Points.Count;
1262 }
1268 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
1269 {
1270 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
1271 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
1272 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
1273 {
1274 string[] sints;
1275 if (s.Contains("\t"))
1276 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
1277 else
1278 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
1279 double x = double.Parse(sints[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1280 double y = double.Parse(sints[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1281 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
1282 }
1283 return pts.ToArray();
1284 }
1290 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
1291 {
1292 string pts = "";
1293 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
1294 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
1295 {
1296 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
1297 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1298 else
1299 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
1300 }
1301 return pts;
1302 }
1305 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
1306 {
1307 if (type == Type.Mask)
1308 {
1309 double minx = double.MaxValue;
1310 double miny = double.MaxValue;
1311 double maxx = double.MinValue;
1312 double maxy = double.MinValue;
1313 for (int y = 0; y < roiMask.Height; y++)
1314 {
1315 for (int x = 0; x < roiMask.Width; x++)
1316 {
1317 if (roiMask.IsSelected(x, y))
1318 {
1319 if (minx > x)
1320 minx = x;
1321 if (miny > y)
1322 miny = y;
1323 if (maxx < x)
1324 maxx = x;
1325 if (maxy < y)
1326 maxy = y;
1327 }
1328 }
1329 }
1330 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(PointsD[0].X + (minx * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX), PointsD[0].Y + (miny * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY),
1331 (maxx - minx) * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX, (maxy - miny) * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY);
1332 return;
1333 }
1334 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
1335 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
1336 foreach (PointD p in Points)
1337 {
1338 if (min.X > p.X)
1339 min.X = p.X;
1340 if (min.Y > p.Y)
1341 min.Y = p.Y;
1342
1343 if (max.X < p.X)
1344 max.X = p.X;
1345 if (max.Y < p.Y)
1346 max.Y = p.Y;
1347 }
1348 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
1349 r.X = min.X;
1350 r.Y = min.Y;
1351 r.W = max.X - min.X;
1352 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
1353 if (r.W == 0)
1354 r.W = 1;
1355 if (r.H == 0)
1356 r.H = 1;
1357 BoundingBox = r;
1358 }
1359 public void Dispose()
1360 {
1361 if (roiMask != null)
1362 {
1363 roiMask.Dispose();
1364 }
1365 }
1366 }
1367
1368 public class Cell
1369 {
1370 public List<ROI> ROIs = new List<ROI>();
1371
1372 public int Depth
1373 {
1374 get { return ROIs.Count; }
1375 }
1376 public VolumeD Volume
1377 {
1378 get; set;
1379 }
1380 public Cell(ROI first)
1381 {
1382 ROIs.Add(first);
1383 }
1384 public Cell FromROIs(ROI first, ROI[] rois)
1385 {
1386 if (first == null)
1387 throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(first), "First ROI cannot be null.");
1388
1389 if (rois == null || rois.Length == 0)
1390 throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(rois), "ROIs array cannot be null or empty.");
1391
1392 // Create the cell using the first ROI
1393 var cell = new Cell(first);
1394
1395 // Maintain a set of unused ROIs
1396 var unusedROIs = new List<ROI>(rois);
1397
1398 for (int i = 0; i < rois.Length; i++)
1399 {
1400 ROI r = rois[i];
1401 if (r.Rect.IntersectsWith(first.GetCenter()))
1402 {
1403
1404 }
1405 }
1406
1407 return cell;
1408 }
1409 }
1410
1411 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
1412 public class Filt
1413 {
1414 /* Defining an enum. */
1415 public enum Type
1416 {
1417 Base = 0,
1418 Base2 = 1,
1419 InPlace = 2,
1420 InPlace2 = 3,
1421 InPlacePartial = 4,
1422 Resize = 5,
1423 Rotate = 6,
1424 Transformation = 7,
1425 Copy = 8
1426 }
1427 public string name;
1428 public IFilter filt;
1429 public Type type;
1430 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
1431 {
1432 name = s;
1433 filt = f;
1434 type = t;
1435 }
1436 }
1437 public static class Filters
1438 {
1439 public static int[,] indexs;
1445 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
1446 {
1447 foreach (Filt item in filters)
1448 {
1449 if (item.name == name)
1450 return item;
1451 }
1452 return null;
1453 }
1461 public static Filt GetFilter(int type, int index)
1462 {
1463 return filters[indexs[type, index]];
1464 }
1465 public static List<Filt> filters = new List<Filt>();
1474 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1475 {
1476 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1477 if (!inPlace)
1478 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1479 try
1480 {
1481 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1482 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
1483 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1484 {
1485 Bitmap bm = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1486 img.Buffers[i] = bm;
1487 }
1488 if (!inPlace)
1489 {
1490 Images.AddImage(img);
1491 }
1492 }
1493 catch (Exception e)
1494 {
1495 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1496 dialog.Show();
1497 }
1498 return img;
1499 }
1510 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1511 {
1512 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1513 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1514 if (!inPlace)
1515 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1516 try
1517 {
1518 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1519 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
1520 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1521 {
1522 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1523 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1524 }
1525 if (!inPlace)
1526 {
1527 Images.AddImage(img);
1528 }
1529 return img;
1530 }
1531 catch (Exception e)
1532 {
1533 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1534 dialog.Show();
1535 }
1536 return img;
1537 }
1546 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1547 {
1548 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1549 if (!inPlace)
1550 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1551 try
1552 {
1553 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1554 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
1555 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1556 {
1557 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1558 }
1559 if (!inPlace)
1560 {
1561 Images.AddImage(img);
1562 }
1563 return img;
1564 }
1565 catch (Exception e)
1566 {
1567 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1568 dialog.Show();
1569 }
1570 return img;
1571 }
1580 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1581 {
1582 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1583 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1584 if (!inPlace)
1585 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1586 try
1587 {
1588 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1589 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
1590 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1591 {
1592 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1593 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1594 }
1595 if (!inPlace)
1596 {
1597 Images.AddImage(img);
1598 }
1599 return img;
1600 }
1601 catch (Exception e)
1602 {
1603 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1604 dialog.Show();
1605 }
1606 return img;
1607 }
1616 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1617 {
1618 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1619 if (!inPlace)
1620 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1621 try
1622 {
1623 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1624 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
1625 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1626 {
1627 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1628 }
1629 if (!inPlace)
1630 {
1631 Images.AddImage(img);
1632 }
1633 return img;
1634 }
1635 catch (Exception e)
1636 {
1637 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1638 dialog.Show();
1639 }
1640 return img;
1641 }
1652 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
1653 {
1654 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1655 if (!inPlace)
1656 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1657 try
1658 {
1659 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1660 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
1661 fi.NewHeight = h;
1662 fi.NewWidth = w;
1663 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1664 {
1665 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1666 }
1667 if (!inPlace)
1668 {
1669 Images.AddImage(img);
1670 }
1671 }
1672 catch (Exception e)
1673 {
1674 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1675 dialog.Show();
1676 }
1677 return img;
1678 }
1691 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
1692 {
1693 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1694 if (!inPlace)
1695 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
1696 try
1697 {
1698 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1699 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
1700 fi.Angle = angle;
1701 fi.FillColor = Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
1702 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1703 {
1704 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1705 }
1706 if (!inPlace)
1707 {
1708 Images.AddImage(img);
1709 }
1710 }
1711 catch (Exception e)
1712 {
1713 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1714 dialog.Show();
1715 }
1716 return img;
1717
1718 }
1729 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
1730 {
1731 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1732 if (!inPlace)
1733 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1734 try
1735 {
1736 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1737 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
1738 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1739 {
1740 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1741 }
1742 if (!inPlace)
1743 {
1744 Images.AddImage(img);
1745 }
1746 }
1747 catch (Exception e)
1748 {
1749 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1750 dialog.Show();
1751 }
1752 return img;
1753 }
1762 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1763 {
1764 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1765 if (!inPlace)
1766 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1767 try
1768 {
1769 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1770 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
1771 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1772 {
1773 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1774 }
1775 if (!inPlace)
1776 {
1777 Images.AddImage(img);
1778 }
1779 }
1780 catch (Exception e)
1781 {
1782 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1783 dialog.Show();
1784 }
1785 return img;
1786 }
1796 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1797 {
1798 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
1799 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
1800 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)Math.Abs(r.Width), (int)Math.Abs(r.Height));
1801 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
1802 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1803 {
1804 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
1805 }
1806 BioImage.AutoThreshold(img, true);
1807 if (img.bitsPerPixel > 8)
1808 img.StackThreshold(true);
1809 else
1810 img.StackThreshold(false);
1811 return img;
1812 }
1819 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
1820 {
1821 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
1822 }
1823
1825 public static void Init()
1826 {
1827 //Base Filters
1828 indexs = new int[9, 32];
1829 indexs[0, 0] = filters.Count;
1830 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
1831 filters.Add(f);
1832 indexs[0, 1] = filters.Count;
1833 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
1834 filters.Add(f);
1835 indexs[0, 2] = filters.Count;
1836 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
1837 filters.Add(f);
1838 indexs[0, 3] = filters.Count;
1839 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
1840 filters.Add(f);
1841 indexs[0, 4] = filters.Count;
1842 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
1843 filters.Add(f);
1844 indexs[0, 5] = filters.Count;
1845 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1846 filters.Add(f);
1847 indexs[0, 6] = filters.Count;
1848 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1849 filters.Add(f);
1850 indexs[0, 7] = filters.Count;

2102 }
2103 }
2104 public class ImageInfo
2105 {
2106 bool HasPhysicalXY = false;
2107 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
2108 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
2109 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
2110 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
2111 public double PhysicalSizeX
2112 {
2113 get { return physicalSizeX; }
2114 set
2115 {
2116 physicalSizeX = value;
2117 HasPhysicalXY = true;
2118 }
2119 }
2120 public double PhysicalSizeY
2121 {
2122 get { return physicalSizeY; }
2123 set
2124 {
2125 physicalSizeY = value;
2126 HasPhysicalXY = true;
2127 }
2128 }
2129 public double PhysicalSizeZ
2130 {
2131 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
2132 set
2133 {
2134 physicalSizeZ = value;
2135 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
2136 }
2137 }
2138
2139 bool HasStageXY = false;
2140 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
2141 public double stageSizeX = -1;
2142 public double stageSizeY = -1;
2143 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
2144 public double StageSizeX
2145 {
2146 get { return stageSizeX; }
2147 set
2148 {
2149 stageSizeX = value;
2150 HasStageXY = true;
2151 }
2152 }
2153 public double StageSizeY
2154 {
2155 get { return stageSizeY; }
2156 set
2157 {
2158 stageSizeY = value;
2159 HasStageXY = true;
2160 }
2161 }
2162 public double StageSizeZ
2163 {
2164 get { return stageSizeZ; }
2165 set
2166 {
2167 stageSizeZ = value;
2168 HasStageXYZ = true;
2169 }
2170 }
2171
2172 private int series = 0;
2173 public int Series
2174 {
2175 get { return series; }
2176 set { series = value; }
2177 }
2178
2182 public ImageInfo Copy()
2183 {
2184 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
2185 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
2186 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
2187 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
2188 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
2189 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
2190 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
2191 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
2192 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
2193 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
2194 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
2195 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
2196 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
2197 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
2198 return inf;
2199 }
2200
2201 }
2202
2203 public class NumPy
2204 {
2205 public enum NpyDataType
2206 {
2207 // Integer types
2208 UInt8 = 1, // |u1
2209 Int8 = 2, // |i1
2210 UInt16 = 3, // |u2
2211 Int16 = 4, // |i2
2212 UInt32 = 5, // |u4
2213 Int32 = 6, // |i4
2214 UInt64 = 7, // |u8
2215 Int64 = 8, // |i8
2216
2217 // Floating point types
2218 Float16 = 9, // |f2
2219 Float32 = 10, // |f4
2220 Float64 = 11, // |f8
2221
2222 // Complex number types (optional depending on your use case)
2223 Complex64 = 12, // |c8
2224 Complex128 = 13 // |c16
2225 }
2226 public static string GetNpyTypeString(NpyDataType type)
2227 {
2228 switch (type)
2229 {
2230 case NpyDataType.UInt8:
2231 return "|u1";
2232 case NpyDataType.Int8:
2233 return "|i1";
2234 case NpyDataType.UInt16:
2235 return "|u2";
2236 case NpyDataType.Int16:
2237 return "|i2";
2238 case NpyDataType.UInt32:
2239 return "|u4";
2240 case NpyDataType.Int32:
2241 return "|i4";
2242 case NpyDataType.UInt64:
2243 return "|u8";
2244 case NpyDataType.Int64:
2245 return "|i8";
2246 case NpyDataType.Float16:
2247 return "|f2";
2248 case NpyDataType.Float32:
2249 return "|f4";
2250 case NpyDataType.Float64:
2251 return "|f8";
2252 case NpyDataType.Complex64:
2253 return "|c8";
2254 case NpyDataType.Complex128:
2255 return "|c16";
2256 default:
2257 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported NpyDataType", nameof(type));
2258 }
2259 }
2260 public static NpyDataType GetNpyTypeEnum(string type)
2261 {
2262 switch (type)
2263 {
2264 case "|u1":
2265 return NpyDataType.UInt8;
2266 case "|i1":
2267 return NpyDataType.Int8;
2268 case "|u2":
2269 return NpyDataType.UInt16;
2270 case "|i2":
2271 return NpyDataType.Int16;
2272 case "|u4":
2273 return NpyDataType.UInt32;
2274 case "|i4":
2275 return NpyDataType.Int32;
2276 case "|u8":
2277 return NpyDataType.UInt64;
2278 case "|i8":
2279 return NpyDataType.Int64;
2280 case "|f2":
2281 return NpyDataType.Float16;
2282 case "|f4":
2283 return NpyDataType.Float32;
2284 case "|f8":
2285 return NpyDataType.Float64;
2286 case "|c8":
2287 return NpyDataType.Complex64;
2288 case "|c16":
2289 return NpyDataType.Complex128;
2290 case "<f4":
2291 return NpyDataType.Float32;
2292 case "<i4":
2293 return NpyDataType.Int32;
2294 default:
2295 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported numpy type string", nameof(type));
2296 }
2297 }
2298 public class NpyHeader
2299 {
2300 // Data type descriptor (|u1 in numpy means unsigned 1-byte integer)
2301 public string descr { get; set; }
2302
2303 // Fortran order flag
2304 public bool fortran_order { get; set; }
2305
2306 // Shape of the array (a tuple or array of integers)
2307 public int[] shape { get; set; }
2308 }
2309 public static void SaveNumPy(BioImage b, string file)
2310 {
2311 float[] fs = new float[b.SizeT * b.SizeZ * b.SizeC * b.SizeX * b.SizeY];
2312 // Fill the flattened array
2313 int index = 0;
2314 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
2315 {
2316 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
2317 {
2318 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
2319 {
2320 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
2321 {
2322 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
2323 {
2324 fs[index++] = b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, t]].GetValue(x, y);
2325 }
2326 }
2327 }
2328 }
2329 }
2330 SaveFloatArrayAsNpy(file, fs, new int[] { b.SizeT, b.SizeC, b.SizeZ, b.SizeX, b.SizeY });
2331 }
2332 private static void SaveFloatArrayAsNpy(string filePath, float[] array, int[] shape)
2333 {
2334 using (var writer = new BinaryWriter(File.Open(filePath, FileMode.Create)))
2335 {
2336 // Write the NPY file header
2337 WriteNpyHeader(writer, shape);
2338
2339 // Write the data
2340 foreach (var value in array)
2341 {
2342 writer.Write(value);
2343 }
2344 }
2345 }
2346 private static void WriteNpyHeader(BinaryWriter writer, int[] shape)
2347 {
2348 // Magic string for NPY format
2349 byte[] magicString = { 0x93, (byte)'N', (byte)'U', (byte)'M', (byte)'P', (byte)'Y' };
2350 writer.Write(magicString);
2351
2352 // NPY version
2353 writer.Write((byte)1); // Major version
2354 writer.Write((byte)0); // Minor version
2355
2356 // Header dictionary
2357 string shapeString = string.Join(", ", shape) + (shape.Length == 1 ? "," : ""); // Trailing comma for single-dim arrays
2358 string header = string.Format(
2359 "{{'descr': '<f4', 'fortran_order': False, 'shape': ({0}), }}",
2360 shapeString
2361 ).PadRight(64); // Ensure header is 64-byte aligned for simplicity
2362
2363 byte[] headerBytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(header);
2364
2365 // Length of the header
2366 ushort headerLength = (ushort)((headerBytes.Length + 63) & ~63); // Align to 64 bytes
2367 writer.Write(headerLength);
2368
2369 // Write the header
2370 writer.Write(headerBytes);
2371
2372 // Pad with spaces to align the header to 64 bytes
2373 for (int i = headerBytes.Length; i < headerLength; i++)
2374 {
2375 writer.Write((byte)' ');
2376 }
2377 }
2378
2387 public static TArray ConvertToMultidimensional<T, TArray>(Array flatArray, int[] shape)
2388 {
2389 if (flatArray.Length != shape.Aggregate(1, (a, b) => a * b))
2390 throw new ArgumentException("The shape does not match the length of the flat array.");
2391
2392 var result = (Array)Array.CreateInstance(typeof(T), shape);
2393
2394 int[] indices = new int[shape.Length];
2395 for (int i = 0; i < flatArray.Length; i++)
2396 {
2397 // Compute the multi-dimensional indices
2398 int offset = i;
2399 for (int j = shape.Length - 1; j >= 0; j--)
2400 {
2401 indices[j] = offset % shape[j];
2402 offset /= shape[j];
2403 }
2404
2405 // Set the value in the multi-dimensional array
2406 result.SetValue(flatArray.GetValue(i), indices);
2407 }
2408
2409 return (TArray)(object)result;
2410 }
2411 static T ReadValue<T>(BinaryReader reader) where T : struct
2412 {
2413 if (typeof(T) == typeof(float))
2414 return (T)(object)reader.ReadSingle();
2415 if (typeof(T) == typeof(double))
2416 return (T)(object)reader.ReadDouble();
2417 if (typeof(T) == typeof(int))
2418 return (T)(object)reader.ReadInt32();
2419 if (typeof(T) == typeof(short))
2420 return (T)(object)reader.ReadInt16();
2421 if (typeof(T) == typeof(byte))
2422 return (T)(object)reader.ReadByte();
2423
2424 throw new NotSupportedException($"Type {typeof(T)} is not supported.");
2425 }
2426 public static (int[], NpyDataType, Array) ReadNpyFile(string filePath)
2427 {
2428 using (var reader = new BinaryReader(File.Open(filePath, FileMode.Open)))
2429 {
2430 // Verify .npy magic string
2431 byte[] magic = reader.ReadBytes(6);
2432 string magicString = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(magic);
2433 if (magicString != "?NUMPY")
2434 {
2435 throw new InvalidOperationException("Invalid .npy file.");
2436 }
2437
2438 // Skip the version information (2 bytes)
2439 reader.BaseStream.Seek(2, SeekOrigin.Current);
2440
2441 // Read the header length (2 bytes)
2442 byte[] headerLengthBytes = reader.ReadBytes(2);
2443 int headerLength = BitConverter.ToInt16(headerLengthBytes, 0);
2444
2445 // Read the header bytes
2446 byte[] headerBytes = reader.ReadBytes(headerLength);
2447 string headerString = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(headerBytes).Replace("True", "true").Replace("False", "false").Replace("(", "[").Replace(")", "]");
2448
2449 // Configure Json.NET to handle camel case
2450 var settings = new JsonSerializerSettings
2451 {
2452 ContractResolver = new CamelCasePropertyNamesContractResolver()
2453 };
2454
2455 // Deserialize the JSON string into an object of type NpyHeader
2456 NpyHeader header = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<NpyHeader>(headerString, settings);
2457 var shape = header.shape;
2458 var dtype = header.descr;
2459 NpyDataType type = GetNpyTypeEnum(dtype);
2460
2461 // Calculate the total number of elements in the array
2462 int totalElements = shape.Aggregate(1, (acc, dim) => acc * dim); // Multiply all dimensions
2463
2464 // Calculate the data size based on the number of elements and element size
2465 int elementSize = GetElementSize(type);
2466 int dataSize = totalElements * elementSize;
2467
2468 // Read the data bytes
2469 byte[] dataBytes = reader.ReadBytes(dataSize);
2470
2471 // Convert the byte array to the proper data type array
2472 Array data = null;
2473 switch (type)
2474 {
2475 case NpyDataType.UInt8:
2476 data = new byte[dataBytes.Length];
2477 Buffer.BlockCopy(dataBytes, 0, data, 0, dataBytes.Length);
2478 break;
2479
2480 case NpyDataType.Int8:
2481 data = new sbyte[dataBytes.Length];
2482 Buffer.BlockCopy(dataBytes, 0, data, 0, dataBytes.Length);
2483 break;
2484
2485 case NpyDataType.UInt16:
2486 data = new ushort[totalElements]; // Using totalElements for multidimensional support
2487 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2488 {
2489 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToUInt16(dataBytes, i * 2), i);
2490 }
2491 break;
2492
2493 case NpyDataType.Int16:
2494 data = new short[totalElements];
2495 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2496 {
2497 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToInt16(dataBytes, i * 2), i);
2498 }
2499 break;
2500
2501 case NpyDataType.UInt32:
2502 data = new uint[totalElements];
2503 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2504 {
2505 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToUInt32(dataBytes, i * 4), i);
2506 }
2507 break;
2508
2509 case NpyDataType.Int32:
2510 data = new int[totalElements];
2511 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2512 {
2513 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToInt32(dataBytes, i * 4), i);
2514 }
2515 break;
2516
2517 case NpyDataType.UInt64:
2518 data = new ulong[totalElements];
2519 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2520 {
2521 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToUInt64(dataBytes, i * 8), i);
2522 }
2523 break;
2524
2525 case NpyDataType.Int64:
2526 data = new long[totalElements];
2527 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2528 {
2529 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToInt64(dataBytes, i * 8), i);
2530 }
2531 break;
2532
2533 case NpyDataType.Float16:
2534 // Convert each 2-byte segment to Float16 (not directly supported by BitConverter)
2535 // You'll need a custom method to handle Float16 conversion
2536 break;
2537
2538 case NpyDataType.Float32:
2539 data = new float[totalElements];
2540 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2541 {
2542 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToSingle(dataBytes, i * 4), i);
2543 }
2544 break;
2545
2546 case NpyDataType.Float64:
2547 data = new double[totalElements];
2548 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2549 {
2550 data.SetValue(BitConverter.ToDouble(dataBytes, i * 8), i);
2551 }
2552 break;
2553
2554 case NpyDataType.Complex64:
2555 data = new (float, float)[totalElements];
2556 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2557 {
2558 var real = BitConverter.ToSingle(dataBytes, i * 8);
2559 var imaginary = BitConverter.ToSingle(dataBytes, i * 8 + 4);
2560 data.SetValue((real, imaginary), i);
2561 }
2562 break;
2563
2564 case NpyDataType.Complex128:
2565 data = new (double, double)[totalElements];
2566 for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
2567 {
2568 var real = BitConverter.ToDouble(dataBytes, i * 16);
2569 var imaginary = BitConverter.ToDouble(dataBytes, i * 16 + 8);
2570 data.SetValue((real, imaginary), i);
2571 }
2572 break;
2573
2574 default:
2575 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported NpyDataType", nameof(type));
2576 }
2577
2578 return (shape, type, data);
2579 }
2580 }
2581
2587 public static int GetElementSize(NpyDataType type)
2588 {
2589 switch (type)
2590 {
2591 case NpyDataType.UInt8:
2592 case NpyDataType.Int8:
2593 return 1; // 1 byte for UInt8 and Int8
2594
2595 case NpyDataType.UInt16:
2596 case NpyDataType.Int16:
2597 return 2; // 2 bytes for UInt16 and Int16
2598
2599 case NpyDataType.UInt32:
2600 case NpyDataType.Int32:
2601 return 4; // 4 bytes for UInt32 and Int32
2602
2603 case NpyDataType.UInt64:
2604 case NpyDataType.Int64:
2605 return 8; // 8 bytes for UInt64 and Int64
2606
2607 case NpyDataType.Float16:
2608 return 2; // 2 bytes for Float16
2609
2610 case NpyDataType.Float32:
2611 return 4; // 4 bytes for Float32
2612
2613 case NpyDataType.Float64:
2614 return 8; // 8 bytes for Float64
2615
2616 case NpyDataType.Complex64:
2617 return 8; // 8 bytes for Complex64 (2 * Float32)
2618
2619 case NpyDataType.Complex128:
2620 return 16; // 16 bytes for Complex128 (2 * Float64)
2621
2622 default:
2623 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported NpyDataType", nameof(type));
2624 }
2625 }
2626
2627 public static T ConvertJaggedArray<T>(Array jaggedArray)
2628 {
2629 // Ensure the provided array is of the correct jagged array type
2630 if (jaggedArray is int[][] jagged)
2631 {
2632 int rows = jagged.Length;
2633 int cols = jagged[0].Length;
2634
2635 // Create an instance of the desired 2D array using reflection
2636 T result = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T), new object[] { rows, cols });
2637
2638 // Copy values from jagged array to the newly created 2D array
2639 for (int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
2640 {
2641 for (int j = 0; j < cols; j++)
2642 {
2643 // Use reflection to set the value in the result array
2644 var element = result.GetType().GetElementType();
2645 result.GetType().GetMethod("SetValue").Invoke(result, new object[] { jagged[i][j], i, j });
2646 }
2647 }
2648
2649 return result;
2650 }
2651
2652 throw new InvalidCastException("The input array is not of the expected type.");
2653 }
2654
2655 public static T CreateJaggedArray<T>(int[] shape, T[] data, int dimension) where T : struct
2656 {
2657 // Base case: if we reached the last dimension, return the data array for that dimension
2658 if (dimension == shape.Length - 1)
2659 {
2660 // Create a 2D array for the last dimension
2661 T[,] array = (T[,])Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T[,]), shape[dimension], data.Length / shape[dimension]);
2662 Array.Copy(data, array, data.Length); // Copy data into the array
2663 return (T)(object)array; // Cast to T (we will handle this later)
2664 }
2665
2666 // Recursive case: create jagged array for higher dimensions
2667 int subDimensionSize = shape[dimension + 1];
2668 int firstDimLength = shape[dimension];
2669
2670 // Create a jagged array for the current dimension
2671 Array jaggedArray = Array.CreateInstance(typeof(Array), shape[dimension]);
2672
2673 int index = 0;
2674 for (int i = 0; i < firstDimLength; i++)
2675 {
2676 // Recursively create the sub-arrays
2677 var subArray = CreateJaggedArray(shape, data.Skip(index).Take(subDimensionSize).ToArray(), dimension + 1);
2678 jaggedArray.SetValue(subArray, i); // Set the sub-array at index
2679 index += subDimensionSize;
2680 }
2681
2682 // Return the jagged array
2683 return (T)Convert.ChangeType(jaggedArray, typeof(T)); // Use Convert.ChangeType to cast System.Array to T
2684 }
2685
2686 static string GetHeader(Array array)
2687 {
2688 // Get the shape of the array
2689 string shape = "(" + string.Join(",", array.GetDimensions().Select(dim => dim.ToString())) + ")";
2690
2691 // Get the data type (assuming float32)
2692 string dtype = "|<f4"; // For little-endian float32 (numpy standard)
2693
2694 // Construct the header
2695 string header = "{'descr': '" + dtype + "', 'fortran_order': False, 'shape': " + shape + "}";
2696
2697 // Pad header length to be even
2698 int headerLength = header.Length + 1;
2699 if (headerLength % 2 != 0)
2700 {
2701 header += " ";
2702 }
2703
2704 return header;
2705 }
2706
2707 static void WriteArrayData(BinaryWriter writer, Array array)
2708 {
2709 // Flatten the array to 1D
2710 var flattenedArray = array.Cast<float>().ToArray();
2711
2712 // Write the data
2713 foreach (var value in flattenedArray)
2714 {
2715 writer.Write(value);
2716 }
2717 }
2718
2719 // Helper method to convert byte[] to the corresponding typed array (e.g., float[], int[], etc.)
2720 public static Array ConvertBytesToTypedArray(byte[] data, NpyDataType dataType)
2721 {
2722 switch (dataType)
2723 {
2724 case NpyDataType.UInt8:
2725 return ConvertByteArrayToUInt8(data);
2726 case NpyDataType.Int8:
2727 return ConvertByteArrayToInt8(data);
2728 case NpyDataType.UInt16:
2729 return ConvertByteArrayToUInt16(data);
2730 case NpyDataType.Int16:
2731 return ConvertByteArrayToInt16(data);
2732 case NpyDataType.UInt32:
2733 return ConvertByteArrayToUInt32(data);
2734 case NpyDataType.Int32:
2735 return ConvertByteArrayToInt32(data);
2736 case NpyDataType.UInt64:
2737 return ConvertByteArrayToUInt64(data);
2738 case NpyDataType.Int64:
2739 return ConvertByteArrayToInt64(data);
2740 case NpyDataType.Float16:
2741 return ConvertByteArrayToFloat16(data);
2742 case NpyDataType.Float32:
2743 return ConvertByteArrayToFloat32(data);
2744 case NpyDataType.Float64:
2745 return ConvertByteArrayToFloat64(data);
2746 case NpyDataType.Complex64:
2747 return ConvertByteArrayToComplex64(data);
2748 case NpyDataType.Complex128:
2749 return ConvertByteArrayToComplex128(data);
2750 default:
2751 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported data type", nameof(dataType));
2752 }
2753 }
2754
2755 // Conversion methods for each type
2756
2757 private static byte[] ConvertByteArrayToUInt8(byte[] data)
2758 {
2759 return data;
2760 }
2761
2762 private static sbyte[] ConvertByteArrayToInt8(byte[] data)
2763 {
2764 int length = data.Length;
2765 sbyte[] result = new sbyte[length];
2766 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2767 {
2768 result[i] = (sbyte)data[i];
2769 }
2770 return result;
2771 }
2772
2773 private static ushort[] ConvertByteArrayToUInt16(byte[] data)
2774 {
2775 int length = data.Length / sizeof(ushort);
2776 ushort[] result = new ushort[length];
2777 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2778 {
2779 result[i] = BitConverter.ToUInt16(data, i * sizeof(ushort));
2780 }
2781 return result;
2782 }
2783
2784 private static short[] ConvertByteArrayToInt16(byte[] data)
2785 {
2786 int length = data.Length / sizeof(short);
2787 short[] result = new short[length];
2788 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2789 {
2790 result[i] = BitConverter.ToInt16(data, i * sizeof(short));
2791 }
2792 return result;
2793 }
2794
2795 private static uint[] ConvertByteArrayToUInt32(byte[] data)
2796 {
2797 int length = data.Length / sizeof(uint);
2798 uint[] result = new uint[length];
2799 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2800 {
2801 result[i] = BitConverter.ToUInt32(data, i * sizeof(uint));
2802 }
2803 return result;
2804 }
2805
2806 private static int[] ConvertByteArrayToInt32(byte[] data)
2807 {
2808 int length = data.Length / sizeof(int);
2809 int[] result = new int[length];
2810 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2811 {
2812 result[i] = BitConverter.ToInt32(data, i * sizeof(int));
2813 }
2814 return result;
2815 }
2816
2817 private static ulong[] ConvertByteArrayToUInt64(byte[] data)
2818 {
2819 int length = data.Length / sizeof(ulong);
2820 ulong[] result = new ulong[length];
2821 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2822 {
2823 result[i] = BitConverter.ToUInt64(data, i * sizeof(ulong));
2824 }
2825 return result;
2826 }
2827
2828 private static long[] ConvertByteArrayToInt64(byte[] data)
2829 {
2830 int length = data.Length / sizeof(long);
2831 long[] result = new long[length];
2832 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2833 {
2834 result[i] = BitConverter.ToInt64(data, i * sizeof(long));
2835 }
2836 return result;
2837 }
2838
2839 private static float[] ConvertByteArrayToFloat16(byte[] data)
2840 {
2841 // For Float16, .NET does not natively support conversion, so you might need a custom implementation
2842 // or use an external library to handle Float16 to Float32 conversion.
2843 // Here's a placeholder for that implementation:
2844 throw new NotImplementedException("Float16 is not natively supported in .NET. You need to convert it to Float32.");
2845 }
2846
2847 private static float[] ConvertByteArrayToFloat32(byte[] data)
2848 {
2849 int length = data.Length / sizeof(float);
2850 float[] result = new float[length];
2851 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2852 {
2853 result[i] = BitConverter.ToSingle(data, i * sizeof(float));
2854 }
2855 return result;
2856 }
2857
2858 private static double[] ConvertByteArrayToFloat64(byte[] data)
2859 {
2860 int length = data.Length / sizeof(double);
2861 double[] result = new double[length];
2862 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2863 {
2864 result[i] = BitConverter.ToDouble(data, i * sizeof(double));
2865 }
2866 return result;
2867 }
2868
2869 private static (float, float)[] ConvertByteArrayToComplex64(byte[] data)
2870 {
2871 int length = data.Length / sizeof(float) / 2;
2872 (float, float)[] result = new (float, float)[length];
2873 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2874 {
2875 float real = BitConverter.ToSingle(data, i * sizeof(float) * 2);
2876 float imaginary = BitConverter.ToSingle(data, i * sizeof(float) * 2 + sizeof(float));
2877 result[i] = (real, imaginary);
2878 }
2879 return result;
2880 }
2881
2882 private static (double, double)[] ConvertByteArrayToComplex128(byte[] data)
2883 {
2884 int length = data.Length / sizeof(double) / 2;
2885 (double, double)[] result = new (double, double)[length];
2886 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
2887 {
2888 double real = BitConverter.ToDouble(data, i * sizeof(double) * 2);
2889 double imaginary = BitConverter.ToDouble(data, i * sizeof(double) * 2 + sizeof(double));
2890 result[i] = (real, imaginary);
2891 }
2892 return result;
2893 }
2894 }
2895 public static class ArrayExtensions
2896 {
2897 // Extension method to get the dimensions of an array
2898 public static int[] GetDimensions(this Array array)
2899 {
2900 int rank = array.Rank;
2901 int[] dimensions = new int[rank];
2902 for (int i = 0; i < rank; i++)
2903 {
2904 dimensions[i] = array.GetLength(i);
2905 }
2906 return dimensions;
2907 }
2908 }
2909
2910 public class BioImage : IDisposable
2911 {
2912 public class WellPlate
2913 {
2914 public class Well
2915 {
2916 public string ID { get; set; }
2917 public int Index { get; set; }
2918 public int Column { get; set; }
2919 public int Row { get; set; }
2920 public System.Drawing.Color Color { get; set; }
2921 public List<Sample> Samples = new List<Sample>();
2922 public class Sample
2923 {
2924 public string ID { get; set; }
2925 public int Index { get; set; }
2926 public PointD Position { get; set; }
2927 public Timestamp Time { get; set; }
2928 }
2929 }
2930 public List<Well> Wells = new List<Well>();
2931
2932 public PointD Origin;
2933 public string ID;
2934 public string Name;
2935 public WellPlate(BioImage b)
2936 {
2937 ID = b.meta.getPlateID(b.series);
2938 Name = b.meta.getPlateName(b.series);
2939 double x, y;
2940 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series) != null)
2941 x = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series).value().doubleValue();
2942 else
2943 x = 0;
2944 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series) != null)
2945 y = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series).value().doubleValue();
2946 else
2947 y = 0;
2948 Origin = new PointD(x, y);
2949 int ws = b.meta.getWellCount(b.series);
2950 for (int i = 0; i < ws; i++)
2951 {
2952 Well w = new Well();
2953 w.ID = b.meta.getWellID(b.series, i);
2954 w.Column = b.meta.getWellColumn(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
2955 w.Row = b.meta.getWellRow(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
2956 int wsc = b.meta.getWellSampleCount(b.series, i);
2957 for (int s = 0; s < wsc; s++)
2958 {
2959 Well.Sample sa = new Well.Sample();
2960 sa.Time = b.meta.getWellSampleTimepoint(b.series, i, s);
2961 sa.Index = b.meta.getWellSampleIndex(b.series, i, s).getNumberValue().intValue();
2962 double sx, sy;
2963 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s) != null)
2964 sx = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
2965 else sx = 0;
2966 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s) != null)
2967 sy = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
2968 else sy = 0;
2969 sa.Position = new PointD(sx, sy);
2970 sa.ID = b.meta.getWellSampleID(b.series, i, s);
2971 w.Samples.Add(sa);
2972 }
2973 BioFormats::ome.xml.model.primitives.Color c = b.meta.getWellColor(b.series, i);
2974 if (c != null)
2975 w.Color = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(c.getAlpha(), c.getRed(), c.getGreen(), c.getBlue());
2976 Wells.Add(w);
2977 }
2978
2979 }
2980 }
2981 public WellPlate Plate = null;
2982 public int[,,] Coords;
2983 private ZCT coordinate;
2984 public ZCT Coordinate
2985 {
2986 get
2987 {
2988 return coordinate;
2989 }
2990 set
2991 {
2992 coordinate = value;
2993 }
2994 }
2995 public enum ImageType
2996 {
2997 stack,
2998 pyramidal,
2999 well,
3000 }
3001 private string id;
3002 public ImageType Type { get; set; }
3003 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
3004 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
3005 public List<AForge.Bitmap> Buffers = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
3006 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();
3007 int level = 0;
3008 public int Level
3009 {
3010 get
3011 {
3012 if (Type == ImageType.well)
3013 return level;
3014 int l = 0;
3015 if (openslideBase != null)
3016 l = OpenSlideGTK.TileUtil.GetLevel(openslideBase.Schema.Resolutions, Resolution);
3017 else
3018 if (slideBase != null)
3019 l = LevelFromResolution(Resolution);
3020 if (l < 0)
3021 return 0;
3022 return l;
3023 }
3024 set
3025 {
3026 if (value < 0)
3027 return;
3028 level = value;
3029 }
3030 }
3031 public VolumeD Volume;
3032 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
3033 public string filename = "";
3034 public string script = "";

3036 {

3039 return filename;
3040 }
3041 set

3043 filename = value;
3044 }
3045 }

3048 {
3049 get
3050 {
3051 return Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount;
3052 }
3053 }

3056 public int seriesCount = 1;
3057 public double frameInterval = 0;
3058 public bool littleEndian = false;

3060 public long loadTimeMS = 0;
3061 public long loadTimeTicks = 0;

3072 }

3078 {
3079 get { return resolution; }
3080 set
3081 {
3082 if (value < 0)
3083 return;
3084 resolution = value;
3085 }

3087 public static float Progress = 0;
3088 ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
3093 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
3094 {
3095 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
3096 if (rois)
3097 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
3098 {
3099 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
3100 }
3101 foreach (Bitmap bf in b.Buffers)
3102 {
3103 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
3104 }
3105 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
3106 {
3107 bi.Channels.Add(c);
3108 }
3109 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
3110 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
3111 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
3112 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
3113 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
3114 bi.series = b.series;
3115 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
3116 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
3117 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
3118 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
3119 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
3120 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
3121 bi.file = b.file;
3122 bi.filename = b.filename;
3123 foreach (var item in b.Resolutions)
3124 {
3125 bi.Resolutions.Add(item);
3126 }
3127 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
3128 bi.MacroResolution = b.MacroResolution;
3129 bi.LabelResolution = b.LabelResolution;
3130 bi.Resolution = b.Resolution;
3131 bi.imagesPerSeries = b.imagesPerSeries;
3132 bi.imRead = b.imRead;
3133 bi.Type = b.Type;
3134 bi.tifRead = b.tifRead;
3135 if (b.OpenSlideBase != null)
3136 {
3137 bi.openslideBase = b.openslideBase;
3138 bi.openSlideImage = b.openSlideImage;
3139 }
3140 else
3141 {
3142 bi.slideBase = b.slideBase;
3143 }
3144 bi.PyramidalOrigin = b.PyramidalOrigin;
3145 bi.PyramidalSize = b.PyramidalSize;
3146 bi.Plate = b.Plate;
3147 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, b, rois);
3148 return bi;
3149 }
3155 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
3156 {
3157 return Copy(b, true);
3158 }
3164 public BioImage Copy(bool rois)
3165 {
3166 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
3167 }
3171 public BioImage Copy()
3172 {
3173 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
3174 }
3182 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
3183 {
3184 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
3185 if (copyAnnotations)
3186 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
3187 {
3188 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
3189 }
3190 if (copyChannels)
3191 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
3192 {
3193 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
3194 }
3195 foreach (var item in b.Resolutions)
3196 {
3197 bi.Resolutions.Add(item);
3198 }
3199 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
3200 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
3201 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
3202 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
3203 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
3204 bi.series = b.series;
3205 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
3206 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
3207 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
3208 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
3209 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
3210 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
3211 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
3212 bi.file = b.file;
3213 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
3214 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
3215 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
3216 bi.MacroResolution = b.MacroResolution;
3217 bi.LabelResolution = b.LabelResolution;
3218 bi.Resolution = b.Resolution;
3219 bi.imagesPerSeries = b.imagesPerSeries;
3220 bi.imRead = b.imRead;
3221 bi.tifRead = b.tifRead;
3222 bi.Type = b.Type;
3223 bi.PyramidalOrigin = b.PyramidalOrigin;
3224 bi.PyramidalSize = b.PyramidalSize;
3225 if (b.OpenSlideBase != null)
3226 {
3227 bi.openslideBase = b.openslideBase;
3228 bi.openSlideImage = b.openSlideImage;
3229 }
3230 else
3231 {
3232 bi.slideBase = b.slideBase;
3233 }
3234 bi.Plate = b.Plate;
3235 return bi;
3236 }
3245 public double GetLevelDownsample(int level)
3246 {
3247 int originalWidth = Resolutions[0].SizeX; // Width of the original level
3248 int nextLevelWidth = Resolutions[level].SizeX; // Width of the next level (downsampled)
3249 return (double)originalWidth / (double)nextLevelWidth;
3250 }
3251 public double[] GetLevelDownsamples()
3252 {
3253 double[] ds = new double[Resolutions.Count];
3254 for (int i = 0; i < Resolutions.Count; i++)
3255 {
3256 ds[i] = Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(i);
3257 }
3258 return ds;
3259 }
3265 public int LevelFromResolution(double Resolution)
3266 {
3267 int l = 0;
3268 double[] ds = GetLevelDownsamples();
3269 if (MacroResolution.HasValue)
3270 {
3271 for (int i = 0; i < MacroResolution.Value; i++)
3272 {
3273 if (ds[i] < Resolution)
3274 l = i;
3275 }
3276 }
3277 else
3278 {
3279 for (int i = 0; i < Resolutions.Count; i++)
3280 {
3281 if (ds[i] < Resolution)
3282 l = i;
3283 }
3284 }
3285 return l;
3286 }
3292 public double GetUnitPerPixel(int level)
3293 {
3294 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(level);
3295 }
3296 public string ID
3297 {
3298 get { return id; }
3299 set { id = value; }
3300 }
3301 public int ImageCount
3302 {
3303 get
3304 {
3305 return Buffers.Count;
3306 }
3307 }
3308 public double PhysicalSizeX
3309 {
3310 get
3311 {
3312 if (isPyramidal)
3313 return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX;
3314 else
3315 if (Plate != null)
3316 return Resolutions[serie].PhysicalSizeX;
3317 else if (Resolutions.Count > 0)
3318 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX;
3319 else
3320 return 0;
3321 }
3322 }
3323 public double PhysicalSizeY
3324 {
3325 get
3326 {
3327 if (isPyramidal)
3328 return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY;
3329 else
3330 if (Plate != null)
3331 return Resolutions[serie].PhysicalSizeY;
3332 else if (Resolutions.Count > 0)
3333 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeY;
3334 else
3335 return 0;
3336 }
3337 }
3338 public double PhysicalSizeZ
3339 {
3340 get
3341 {
3342 if (isPyramidal)
3343 return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeZ;
3344 else
3345 if (Plate != null)
3346 return Resolutions[serie].PhysicalSizeZ;
3347 else if (Resolutions.Count > 0)
3348 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeZ;
3349 else
3350 return 0;
3351 }
3352 }
3353 public double StageSizeX
3354 {
3355 get
3356 {
3357 if (isPyramidal)
3358 return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeX;
3359 else
3360 if (Plate != null)
3361 return Resolutions[serie].StageSizeX;
3362 else if (Resolutions.Count > 0)
3363 return Resolutions[0].StageSizeX;
3364 else
3365 return imageInfo.stageSizeX;
3366 }
3367 set
3368 {
3369 imageInfo.StageSizeX = value;
3370 }
3371 }
3372 public double StageSizeY
3373 {
3374 get
3375 {
3376 if (isPyramidal)
3377 return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeY;
3378 else
3379 if (Plate != null)
3380 return Resolutions[serie].StageSizeY;
3381 else if (Resolutions.Count > 0)
3382 return Resolutions[0].StageSizeY;
3383 else
3384 return imageInfo.stageSizeY;
3385 }
3386 set { imageInfo.StageSizeY = value; }
3387 }
3388 public double StageSizeZ
3389 {
3390 get
3391 {
3392 if (isPyramidal)
3393 return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeZ;
3394 else
3395 if (Plate != null)
3396 return Resolutions[serie].StageSizeZ;
3397 else if (Resolutions.Count > 1)
3398 return Resolutions[0].StageSizeZ;
3399 else
3400 return imageInfo.stageSizeZ;
3401 }
3402 set { imageInfo.StageSizeZ = value; }
3403 }
3404
3405 AForge.Size s = new AForge.Size(1920, 1080);
3406 public AForge.Size PyramidalSize { get { return s; } set { s = value; } }

3433 public Channel RChannel
3434 {
3435 get
3436 {
3437 if(Channels.Count >= 3)
3438 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
3439 else
3440 return Channels[0];
3441 }
3442 }
3443 public Channel GChannel
3444 {
3445 get
3446 {
3447 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
3448 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
3449 else
3450 return Channels[0];
3451 }
3452 }
3453 public Channel BChannel
3454 {
3455 get
3456 {
3457 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
3458 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
3459 else
3460 return Channels[0];
3461 }
3462 }
3463 private List<ROI> annotationsR = new List<ROI>();

3465 {

3469 }
3470 }

3477 }
3478 }

3481 {

3485 }
3486 }
3487 public class ImageJDesc
3488 {
3489 public string ImageJ;
3490 public int images = 0;
3491 public int channels = 0;
3492 public int slices = 0;
3493 public int frames = 0;
3494 public bool hyperstack;
3495 public string mode;
3496 public string unit;
3497 public double finterval = 0;
3498 public double spacing = 0;
3499 public bool loop;
3500 public double min = 0;
3501 public double max = 0;
3502 public int count;
3503 public bool bit8color = false;
3504
3513 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
3514 {
3515 ImageJ = "";
3516 images = b.ImageCount;
3517 channels = b.SizeC;
3518 slices = b.SizeZ;
3519 frames = b.SizeT;
3520 hyperstack = true;
3521 mode = "grayscale";
3522 unit = "micron";
3523 finterval = b.frameInterval;
3524 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
3525 loop = false;
3526 /*
3527 double dmax = double.MinValue;
3528 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
3529 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
3530 {
3531 if(dmax < c.Max)
3532 dmax = c.Max;
3533 if(dmin > c.Min)
3534 dmin = c.Min;
3535 }
3536 min = dmin;
3537 max = dmax;
3538 */
3539 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
3540 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
3541 return this;
3542 }
3546 public string GetString()
3547 {
3548 string s = "";
3549 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
3550 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
3551 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
3552 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
3553 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
3554 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
3555 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
3556 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
3557 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
3558 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
3559 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
3560 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
3561 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
3562 return s;
3563 }
3567 public void SetString(string desc)
3568 {
3569 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
3570 int maxlen = 20;
3571 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
3572 {
3573 if (i < maxlen)
3574 {
3575 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
3576 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
3577 ImageJ = sp[1];
3578 if (sp[0] == "images")
3579 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3580 if (sp[0] == "channels")
3581 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3582 if (sp[0] == "slices")
3583 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3584 if (sp[0] == "frames")
3585 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3586 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
3587 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
3588 if (sp[0] == "mode")
3589 mode = sp[1];
3590 if (sp[0] == "unit")
3591 unit = sp[1];
3592 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
3593 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3594 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
3595 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3596 if (sp[0] == "loop")
3597 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
3598 if (sp[0] == "min")
3599 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3600 if (sp[0] == "max")
3601 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3602 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
3603 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
3604 }
3605 else
3606 return;
3607 }
3608
3609 }
3610 }
3611 public int SizeX
3612 {
3613 get
3614 {
3615 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
3616 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
3617 else return 0;
3618 }
3619 }
3620 public int SizeY
3621 {
3622 get
3623 {
3624 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
3625 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
3626 else return 0;
3627 }
3628 }
3629 public int SizeZ
3630 {
3631 get { return sizeZ; }
3632 }
3633 public int SizeC
3634 {
3635 get { return sizeC; }
3636 }
3637 public int SizeT
3638 {
3639 get { return sizeT; }
3640 }
3641 public static bool Planes = false;
3642 public enum Order
3643 {
3644 ZCT,
3645 CZT,
3646 TCZ
3647 }
3648 public double Magnification
3649 {
3650 get; set;
3651 }

3653 {
3654 get; set;
3655 }
3656 public object Tag { get; set; }

3658 {
3659 get
3660 {
3661 return RChannel.RangeR;
3662 }

3665 {
3666 get
3667 {
3668 return GChannel.RangeG;
3669 }
3670 }
3671 public IntRange BRange
3672 {
3673 get
3674 {
3675 return BChannel.RangeB;
3676 }
3677 }
3678 public Bitmap SelectedBuffer
3679 {
3680 get
3681 {
3682 return Buffers[GetFrameIndex(Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T)];
3683 }
3684 }
3685 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
3686 public bool isRGB
3687 {
3688 get
3689 {
3690 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
3691 return true;
3692 else
3693 return false;
3694 }
3695 }
3696 public bool isTime
3697 {
3698 get
3699 {
3700 if (SizeT > 1)
3701 return true;
3702 else
3703 return false;
3704 }
3705 }
3706 public bool isSeries
3707 {
3708 get
3709 {
3710 if (seriesCount > 1)
3711 return true;
3712 else
3713 return false;
3714 }
3715 }
3716 public bool isPyramidal
3717 {
3718 get
3719 {
3720 if (Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
3721 return true;
3722 else
3723 return false;
3724 }
3725 }
3726 public string file;
3727 static string stat;
3728 public static string Status
3729 {
3730 get
3731 {
3732 return stat;
3733 }
3734 set
3735 {
3736 stat = value;
